column1:
# (/\*[^*]*\*+(?:[^/*][^*]*\*+)*/|//(?:[^\]|\
?)*?
)|(""(?:\[\S\s]|[^""\])*""|'(?:\[\S\s]|[^'\])*'|[\S\s][^/""'\]*)
        
        
        (                                # (1 start), Comments 
             /\*                              # Start /* .. */ comment
             [^*]* \*+
             (?: [^/*] [^*]* \*+ )*
             /                                # End /* .. */ comment
          |  
             //                               # Start // comment
             (?: [^\] | \ 
? )*?           # Possible line-continuation
             
                               # End // comment
        )                                # (1 end)
     |  
        (                                # (2 start), Non - comments 
             ""
             (?: \ [\S\s] | [^""\] )*        # Double quoted text
             ""
          |  '
             (?: \ [\S\s] | [^'\] )*        # Single quoted text
             ' 
          |  [\S\s]                           # Any other char
             [^/""'\]*                        # Chars which doesn't start a comment, string, escape,
                                              # or line continuation (escape + newline)
        )                                # (2 end)
